full_summary:
====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Details

* **Title**: Phase Two - EZ976-241201 - Civic Building Fire Alarm System Replacement - Pelly Crossing, Yukon
* **Reference Number**: WS4474413016-Doc4529270656
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4474413016
* **Document Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Notice Overview

The Government of Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to submit a sealed offer for the provision of fire alarm system replacement services for the civic building in Pelly Crossing, Yukon. The proposed contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the qualified suppliers.

#### Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: April 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 28, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 30, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2024

#### Contract Requirements

The contract requires the successful supplier to provide fire alarm system replacement services, including but not limited to:

* Fire alarm systems
* Standby or emergency power installation services
* Fire alarm maintenance or monitoring services

#### Classification and Trade Agreements

This procurement falls under the following classification codes:

* 46191505: Fire alarm systems
* 72151505: Standby or emergency power installation services
* 92121702: Fire alarm maintenance or monitoring services

The proposed contract is also governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Klyne, Brandie (SPAC/PSPC)
brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice Link and Attachments

Please note that there are no attachments to this notice. The full notice can be found on the relevant government website. 

#### Cancelled Solicitation

This solicitation has been cancelled due to the re-evaluation of the requirements.  No further bids will be accepted. 

Note:
- only the relevant information was kept.
- the text was rephrased and structured to ensure readability.
- grammar errors were corrected.
